31  public class DlApplicationFixtureFactory {
32  	/***
33  	 * Creates a new DlApplicationFixture object.
34  	 * 
35  	 * @return the dl application
36  	 * 
37  	 * @throws Exception the exception
38  	 */
39  	public static DlApplication createDlApplicationForDocumentGeneration()
40  			throws Exception {
41  		// license
42  		DlApplication dlAppln = new DlApplication();
43  		DriverLicense dLicense = new DriverLicense();
44  		dlAppln.setLicense(dLicense);
45  		dLicense.setLicenseNumber("I8005638");
46  		CodeSetElement licenseClass = new CodeSetElement();
47  		licenseClass.setCode("C");
48  		dLicense.getAppliedLicenseClasses().add(licenseClass);
49  		// social Security document
50  		SocialSecurityDocument doc = new SocialSecurityDocument();
51  		doc.setSsn("123-45-6789");
52  		List <Document> docs = new ArrayList <Document>();
53  		docs.add(doc);
54  		dlAppln.setDocuments(docs);
55  		// person
56  		Person person = new Person();
57  		DateFormat format = new SimpleDateFormat("MM-dd-yy");
58  		Date date = format.parse("05-13-56");
59  		person.setBirthDate(date);
60  		List <PersonName> personNames = new ArrayList <PersonName>();
61  		PersonName pName = new PersonName();
62  		personNames.add(pName);
63  		person.setPersonNames(personNames);
64  		pName.setFirstName("Alexander");
65  		pName.setLastName("Fleming");
66  		pName.setMiddleName("M");
67  		// address
68  		Set <Address> addresses = new HashSet <Address>();
69  		Address mailingAddress = new Address(AddressType.MAILING);
70  		//person.addAddress(mailingAddress, true);
71  		mailingAddress.setLine1("2415 1st ave");
72  		mailingAddress.setLine2("SACRAMENTO CA 95818");
73  		return dlAppln;
74  	};
75  
76  	/***
77  	 * Instantiates a new dl application fixture factory.
78  	 */
79  	private DlApplicationFixtureFactory() {
80  	}
81  }
